snippet.title: Journey to Incrementalia - Incremental / Idle RPG - Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo now available on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3147430/Journey_to_Incrementalia/

Next Fest Demo update 0.60 is now available! The demo will be available until the full release on October 24, 2024. 

Journey to Incrementalia is a new incremental/idle/clicker game about summoning minions, sacrificing minions, casting dark magic and breaking down 99 legendary walls on your quest to reach the lost city of Incrementalia! 

Journey to Incrementalia is inspired by Magic the Gathering, fantasy board games, Diablo 2 and incremental games like Cookie Clicker, Spaceplan and (the) Gnorp Apologue. 



Game by Adam Travers 2024.
